KeyPairName.Description: Key Pair to use for administrative login on all nodes
KeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Key Pair in this region

ValidatorUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must have at least 3 alphanumerics characters from the set [a-zA-Z0-9]; no special characters or whitespace are allowed

ValidatorPassword.Description: Password for all Validator login (minimum 8 alphanumerics)
ValidatorPassword.ConstraintDescription: Must have at least 8 alphanumerics characters from the set [a-zA-Z0-9]; no special characters or whitespace are allowed

AgentUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must have at least 3 alphanumerics characters from the set [a-zA-Z0-9]; no special characters or whitespace are allowed

AgentPassword.ConstraintDescription: Must have at least 8 alphanumerics characters from the set [a-zA-Z0-9]; no special characters or whitespace are allowed

DomainName.Description: Domain name to append to all hostnames (no leading '.')
DomainName.ConstraintDescription: Must be formatted as a valid domain name without the leading '.'

Validator01Hostname.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid hostname (not FQDN)

Validator01InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Instance Type

Validator02Hostname.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid hostname (not FQDN)

Validator02InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Instance Type

Validator03Hostname.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid hostname (not FQDN)

Validator03InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Instance Type

Validator04Hostname.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid hostname (not FQDN)

Validator04InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Instance Type

Agent01Hostname.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid hostname (not FQDN)

Agent01InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Instance Type
